snippet: After the whirlwind of panels, talks, parties and barbecue, a look back at some of the themes and ideas that came out of South by Southwest Interactive, the annual gathering of tech enthusiasts in Austin, Tex.
abstract: After the whirlwind of panels, talks, parties and barbecue, a look back at some of the themes and ideas that came out of South by Southwest Interactive, the annual gathering of tech enthusiasts in Austin, Tex.
